name: filepizza
description: FilePizza is a peer-to-peer file transfer service built on WebRTC. Sharing begins when a user selects a file and shares a link; no server stores the file. Ideal for fast, browser-based transfer without setup.
features: P2P Transfer: Peer-to-peer file sharing, WebRTC-based, No server storage. Direct browser-to-browser transfers.
Privacy: Files never touch the server. Complete privacy.
Fast: Direct connections for speed. No upload delays.
No Setup: Works in any modern browser. Instant sharing.
Real-Time: Transfer while sender is online. Live connections.
Secure: Encrypted peer connections. Safe transfers.
No Size Limits: Transfer large files. No restrictions.
Simple UI: Clean interface. Easy to use.
Self-Hosted: Run your own instance. Full control.
